description: Replaces each element in a list of text according to the given pattern, returning the new list

input.name: pattern
input.description:
The text to be replaced or a regular expression describing it.
Regular expressions must be wrapped with `/` character (e.g. `/.*/`). Capture groups can be used by the replacement field (e.g. as `$1`, `$2` etc).

input.name: replacement
input.description:
The replacement for the text matched by the specified `pattern` parameter.
 If unspecified, matches will be replaced with a blank text (i.e. `""`). If a regular expression was used in the pattern field, capture groups and the following special syntax is allowed: `$$` - '$' character; ``$``` - text preceding the match; `$'` text following the match.
